description: The course builds on the basic tax concepts used to determine income tax payable by considering specific contemporary issues such as the taxation of entities, special topics in capital gains tax, international issues, tax evasion & avoidance, administrative aspects of tax, & goods & services tax.
prerequisites: All Level 1 & 2 LAWS courses + LAWS3113 + LAWS3114 + LAWS4112 + LAWS5144
restricted: LLB(Hons)(#64), LLB(Hons)(#48), LLB, LLB (Graduate Entry), LLB(Hons) duals and LLB dual programs.
